title: Miley Cyrus shares sweet video of boyfriend Cody Simpson serenading her in the hospital
text:
Miley Cyrus is currently hospitalized as she recovers from tonsillitis, but she's staying in good spirits.

It doesn't hurt to have a sweet boyfriend like Cody Simpson who shows up for visitation hours, guitar in tow.

Cyrus took to her Instagram story Tuesday with a black-and-white video of Simpson serenading her in bed.

Serenading the sick: Miley Cyrus took to her Instagram story Tuesday with a black-and-white video of boyfriend Cody Simpson serenading her in bed while she was hospitalized with tonsillitis

But the video was posted without the sound, as it was a special song he wrote for her only.

She wrote: 'It's too special to be only heard in full by my ears so I am currently pressuring him to DROP IT next week... & it's working.'

The Australian musician also brought roses for his beloved, as he arrived toting his guitar case.

She recently began dating Simpson amid her divorce with Liam Hemsworth, following her fling with Kaitlynn Carter

Private performance: But the video was posted without the sound, as it was a special song he wrote for her only

Best boyfriend ever: The Australian musician also brought roses for his beloved, as he arrived toting his guitar case

Cyrus and Hemsworth initially began dating from 2009, got engaged in 2012, broke up in 2013, and rekindled the romance around 2016.

She seemed upbeat as she updated fans on her health, posting a selfie from bed: 'Trying to heal quick so I can make it to Gorillapalooza ... this weekend!'

She tagged Ellen DeGeneres and Portia de Rossi, who host the music festival to benefit their wildlife charity The Ellen Fund, as well as Bruno Mars, who's slated to perform.

Good spirits: She seemed upbeat as she updated fans on her health, posting a selfie from bed

Quick recovery: She explained that she's trying to make a quick recovery, in order to make it to Gorillapalooza, Ellen DeGeneres and Portia de Rossi's music festival to benefit their wildlife charity The Ellen Fund

Main gays: In another shot, she thanked her 'main gays' as she lied next to a vase of flowers and a balloon with rose petals scattered across her blanket

She asked for a boost from nearly 100 million followers in hopes of a swift recovery so she can make it to show: 'Send gooooood vibes my way! Hoping the Rock star G*DS send me a boost of bad a** and help me kick this s*** to the curb where it belongs! We got gorillas to save!'

In another shot, she thanked her 'main gays' as she lied next to a vase of flowers and a balloon with rose petals scattered across her blanket.

Cyrus was also visited by her mom Tish, who brushed her daughter's hair while she modeled a hospital gown in the bathroom mirror.
